tweaks_section.show_artist_when_collab: show artist when is a collab
tweaks_section.show_artist_when_remix: show artist when is a remix

add_songs_overlay.automatic_description: automatic: RankWizard will automatically organize the song's metadata.
add_songs_overlay.manual_description: manual: manually add the song's metadata
add_songs_overlay.add_songs_description:
one song per line, examples:
Artist 1 & Artist 2 - Title
Artist - Title (ft. Artist)
Artist 1, Artist 2 - Title (Artist Remix)
Artist 1 + Artist 2 - Title (Subtitle)
add_songs_overlay.rankmagnet_alternative: or, you can import songs by pasting a RankMagnet code below
add_songs_overlay.rankmagnet_help: how to get a RankMagnet code
add_songs_overlay.many_songs_warning:
Reminder:  You are about to add %s tracks. Althought the app can handle this large amount of tracks, it may become sluggish to scroll around.

Anyways, can we talk about how huge this album you're about to rank is?! Damn.

edit_songs_overlay.title: title
edit_songs_overlay.multiple_artists_comma: multiple artists can be separated by commas

export_tracklist_overlay.export_tracklist_code: export your tracklist by sharing the RankMagnet code below. note: it doesn't contain your scores and comments, only the songs.

rankmagnet.replace_tracklist_warning:
This will erase your current tracklist! Do you want to continue?

You can change this behaviour on the settings
Behaviour > RankMagnet action > Replace or Merge
rankmagnet.merge_tracklist_warning:
This will merge to your current tracklist! Do you want to continue?

You can change this behaviour on the settings
Behaviour > RankMagnet action > Replace or Merge
rankmagnet.get:
How to get a RankMagnet?

RankMagnets can be exported by people who already have a tracklist. To export your tracklist you can use the 'export tracklist' button; A code will be given which can use to import songs.
